#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstdio>
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
    if(!(a%b)) return b;
    else return gcd(b,a%b);
}
long long int fib[1000001];


int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    int j=2;
    fib[0]=0;
    fib[1]=1;
    while(j<1000001)
    {
        fib[j]=(fib[j-1]+fib[j-2])%1000000007;
        j++;
    }
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int num1,num2;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&num1,&num2);
        long long int ans=gcd(num1,num2);
        cout<<fib[ans]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
